categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic starships

nodes.text: Glaser was a CR90 Corvette employed by the Rebels. The corvette was part of a Rebel strike force attacking an Imperial Frigate Laantis while it was receiving a new Hyperdrive engine from the freighter Rasvin. The corvette was destroyed in the battle.
The Glaser, along with a number of Y-wings are purple in the CMD. However, there is no indication of who they belong to other then the Rebels.
